query.statement:
SELECT '' CHK ,A.DOCNO ,A.PJT ,A.USR ,A.BMT ,A.TEM ,A.YDT ,A.MDT ,A.SEQ ,A.S004 ,A.S004_NM ,A.TRANS ,A.TEM_NM ,A.ZIP ,A.ADR1 ,A.ADR2 ,A.DZIP ,A.DADR1 ,A.DADR2 ,A.RECEV_NM ,A.PHO ,A.NAM ,A.ADR ,A.TXT ,A.RQT ,A.REF ,A.NZIB FROM ( SELECT
'Çö¿¤-'||CS316.CS316_TEM||'-'||CS316.CS316_YDT||'-'||CS316.CS316_MDT||'-'||CS316.CS316_SEQ DOCNO ,CS316.CS316_PJT AS PJT ,CS316.CS316_TEM AS TEM ,CS316.CS316_YDT AS YDT ,CS316.CS316_MDT AS MDT ,CS316.CS316_SEQ AS SEQ ,MAX(CS316.CS316_USR) AS USR ,MAX(CS316.CS316_BMT) AS BMT ,MAX(CS316.S004) AS S004 ,MAX(ZCD1.CTEXT2) AS S004_NM ,MAX(CASE WHEN TDT != '' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END) AS TRANS ,MAX(ZCD2.CTEXT2 ) AS TEM_NM ,MAX(CS316.ZIP ) AS ZIP ,MAX(CS316.ADR1 ) AS ADR1 ,MAX(CS316.ADR2 ) AS ADR2 ,MAX(CS316.DZIP ) AS DZIP ,MAX(CS316.DADR1 ) AS DADR1 ,MAX(CS316.DADR2 ) AS DADR2 ,MAX(CS316.RECEV_NM ) AS RECEV_NM ,MAX(CS316.CS316_PHO) AS PHO ,MAX(CS316.CS316_NAM) AS NAM ,MAX(CS316.CS316_ADR) AS ADR ,MAX(CS316.CS316_TXT) AS TXT ,MAX(CS316.CS316_RQT) AS RQT ,MAX(CS316.CS316_REF) AS REF ,MAX(WB010.VKGRP) AS VKGRP ,MAX(CS316.NZIB ) AS NZIB
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST316 CS316 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD1 ON ZCD1.MANDT = CS316.MANDT AND ZCD1.CODE1 = 'CSS004' AND ZCD1.CODE2 = CS316.S004 AND ZCD1.LANG = 'ko'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 CS111 ON CS111.MANDT = CS316.MANDT AND CS111.PJT = CS316.CS316_PJT
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010 ON WB010.MANDT = CS316.MANDT AND CS111.BSU = WB010.LGORT
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD2 ON ZCD2.MANDT = CS316.MANDT AND ZCD2.CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND ZCD2.CODE2 = WB010.VKGRP AND ZCD2.LANG = 'ko'
WHERE CS316.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND CS316.CS316_PJT = #PJT#
AND CS316.TID = ''
AND CS316.TID != ''
GROUP BY CS316.MANDT ,CS316.CS316_TEM ,CS316.CS316_YDT ,CS316.CS316_MDT ,CS316.CS316_SEQ ,CS316.CS316_PJT ) A
WHERE 1=1
AND A.VKGRP = #TEM#
WITH UR
